page.title: 02Rolleston and its Church
page.content: Rolleston is a small rural village. Wherever you look there are large patches of greenery and lovely old buildings. The oldest building is St. maryÂ£s Church:it is older than the oldest house.The church was well used in the past and we feel at present it is used more often.It is a meeting place for the choir,the bell ringers,confirmation classes,Bible study,Helpers and the Delta group which teaches children over nine to teach others.There is also a baptism on the first Sunday of each month. The vicar is a very busy man but in between all these activities he still gets the chance to get the day off on a Thursday.On this day off he likes to go out for a drive with his wife or lie under his car and fiddle with it.
